description:
Iced coffees don’t have to just be for cheat days. Polar Joe’s nutrient rich cold brew will help you fuel-up or refuel. Packed with grass-fed New Zealand whey protein, every serving aids in recovery.

  • Ingredients: whey protein isolate, organic coconut sugar, non-dairy creamer (sunflower oil, corn syrup solids, sodium caseinate, mono and diglycerides, dipotassium phosphate, tricalcium phosphate, soy lecithin), coffee, and sunflower lecithan
  • 21g of whey protein helps speed up your recovery
  • Natural caffeine from real coffee helps add a boost of energy
  • 6-pack is an easy way to try a new flavour or see if Polar Joe is for you. Plus, the single serving packets are fit well in your daypack, gym bag, or desk drawer
  • Designed to dissolve in cold water, no more clumps and non-stop stirring. Not for use in hot water, can be used in warm water (sub 70°)
  • Allergens: contains milk and soy
name: Polar Joe Classic Cold Brew 6-Pack
